mapper.select: SELECT tb_article.article_id, tb_article.article_name, tb_article.brief_introduction FROM tb_article WHERE tb_article.state = #{state} AND tb_article.article_id IN ( SELECT tb_article_super_article_id.article_id FROM tb_article_super_article_id WHERE tb_article_super_article_id.super_article_id = #{artilceid} ) ORDER BY CAST(tb_article.bei_yong_liu AS signed) DESC
